text: Andreas Demetriou (; born Andreas Panteli Demetriou on 15 August 1950) is a former Minister of Education and Culture of Cyprus and a psychologist. He is now the president of The Cyprus Academy of Sciences, Letters and Arts. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 2012. == Other websites == * Ministry of education and culture of Cyprus * Curriculum Vitae of Andreas Demetriou (Minister of Education and Culture of Cyprus) ==References== Category:Government ministers Category:Members of Academia Europaea Category:Living people Category:1950 births Category:Cypriot people
title: Andreas Demetriou
